snippet: Representative Shelley Berkley, a Democrat facing Senator Dean Heller in an intensely competitive election, faces allegations that she used her office to help her husband.
abstract: House ethics committee appoints formal investigative panel to look into allegations that Rep Shelley Berkley of Nevada, a Democrat who is facing incumbent Republican Sen Dean Heller in an intensely competitive election, had used her office to help her husband’s medical practice; move by committee suggests that a preliminary investigation found at least some evidence of wrongdoing.
lead_paragraph: Representative Shelley Berkley, a Democrat facing Senator Dean Heller in an intensely competitive election, faces allegations that she used her office to help her husband.

headline.seo: House Panel Appointed in Ethics Inquiry Into Nevada Lawmaker
headline.main: Panel Seated in Ethics Inquiry Into Nevada Lawmaker
headline.print_headline: Panel Seated in Ethics Inquiry Into Nevada Lawmaker
